graphql-maven-plugin-samples
Last Published: 2019-06-27  | Version: 1.0.0-RC2-SNAPSHOT

Project Summary

Project Information

Field Value
Name graphql-maven-plugin-samples
Description This maven pom project embeds the various samples for the graphql-maven-plugin. These samples act both as samples, and integration tests, to validate the behavior of the plugin in different configurations.
Homepage https://github.com/graphql-java-generator/graphql-java-generator/graphql-maven-plugin-samples
